name: hidden_place
description:
Hidden place is a top-down action/adventure game. While playing you take on many challenges, trying to reach the center of a mysterious forest. My goal was to create a more methodical approach to combat compared to the typical bullet-hell style games, which are usually very chaotic and unpredictable.

I made this game while bored in high school, so you should not expect that much of it. It has about 2h of play time, depending how well you do. Overall i think you could have a good time taking on the challenges, but i also spent so much time playtesting this that it might just be a form of stockholm syndrome.

You can also find the source code here: https://github.com/Sulicek/hidden_place

Made using the Chili Framework: https://wiki.planetchili.net/index.php/Chili_Framework
